name: Selman Dedeakayoğulları
title: Jr. AI Engineer
profile: Known for combining technical expertise with a positive and engaging team spirit, I work in the field of artificial intelligence and software development, particularly focusing on large language models (LLMs) and computer vision. I enjoy generating original ideas and implementing them in the most practical and effective way. I believe that collaboration amplifies success, and I always strive to elevate both performance and team morale in every project I contribute to.

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
experience.description: Developed and maintained chatbots using low-code AI platforms. Built LLM-based solutions using models like LLama, GPT-4o, and GPT-4 Vision.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Contributed to backend development of various modules. Left early due to Erasmus+ program.

experience.title: Computer Vision Intern
experience.description: Developed multiple classification and segmentation applications using PyTorch and TensorFlow.

projects.name: Social Media Analysis for Earthquake Victim Reports
projects.description: TEKNOFEST Hackathon 2024 finalist project, currently evolving as a thesis study.

projects.name: Gendiary: New-Gen Social Media
projects.description: Social media app generating content with Stable Diffusion. Software engineering course project.

projects.name: Image Captioning Project
projects.description: Fine-tuned VLMs and optimized pipelines for an AI competition.

projects.name: Face Recognition Application
projects.description: MT-CNN based face recognition system. Also published an article on Medium.

projects.name: Media Control with Gesture Recognition
projects.description: Machine Learning course term project using MediaPipe and custom gesture algorithms.

projects.name: City Sounds Classification
projects.description: Deep learning project using UrbanSound8K dataset for sound classification.

projects.name: Agentic Portfolio Bot
projects.description: Agent Based Portfolio Assistant who can handle contact requests and provide resume information by performing Retrieval Augmented Production.

awards.name: TEKNOFEST T3 AI Hackathon 2024 Finalist
awards.description: Selected among 200+ teams to develop an LLM-based project in 48 hours.

awards.name: OBSS Code Master 2022
awards.description: Ranked 1st among university participants in an algorithm-based problem-solving competition.
